data.persona: I am tired of these dead end jobs.  I am no half-baked mage.  I am Karest the Great!  I have a staff of purest gold and I know how to use it.  Yet here I am with these no-talent mages.
data.description:
You are in the Within the walls of the city.
The Tower stands tall, built of the best stone with a number of odd runes that only the local mages truly know how to read. Despite age the stones do not crumble, and stand ever vigilante as a watch station for the city.
There's a rune here.
The grass snake is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the grass snake before he bites me.
data.mid_motivation: I don't want to be bitten, and I need to stun and catch the grass snake to extract his venom.
data.long_motivation: I need the venom of the snake to perform my next great magic spell, which will turn all the no-talent mages of the world into snails.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go Courtyard within the walls of the city.
